short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random quote, weather information, and a task list on the new tab page with a daily changing background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays a random quote, weather information, and a task list on the new tab page with a daily changing background.
*Different Quotes on New Tabs
*Background changes based on Quote
*Customize Weather location
*Search Engines
